trial_type.Description: Category of trial based on stimuli characteristics

stim_duration.Description: Duration of stimulus from beginning of the sentence to the end of the sentence

stim_violation_type.Description: Type of grammatical violation in some of the sentences

Levels.omitt: omit an inflection or auxiliary verb

stim_averaged_frequency.Description: Averaged frequency of all the words in the sentence

stim_averaged_word_length.Description: Averaged word length of all the words in the sentence

stim_total_number_syllable.Description: Number of syllables of all the words in the sentence

carrier_phrase.Description: The carrier phrase at the beginning of some of the sentences

carrier_phrase_word_frequency.Description: Sum of the HAL frequency of each word in the carrier phrase based on the English Lexicon Project

carrier_phrase_word_length.Description: Sum of the number of characters of each word in the carrier phrase based on the English Lexicon Project

carrier_phrase_syllable_num.Description: Sum of the number of syllables of each word in the carrier phrase based on the English Lexicon Project

pause1_duration.Description: Duration of pause between the carrier phrase and the subject phrase

subject.Description: The sentence's subject that appears in all sentences

subject_word_frequency.Description: HAL frequency of the subject word based on the English Lexicon Project

subject_word_length.Description: Number of characters composing the subject word based on the English Lexicon Project

subject_syllable_num.Description: Number of syllables composing the subject word based on the English Lexicon Project

verb1.Description: The first verb or present progressive copula or auxiliary verb in the sentence

verb1_word_frequency.Description: HAL frequency of the first verb or present progressive copula or auxiliary verb in the sentence based on the English Lexicon Project

verb1_word_length.Description: Number of characters composing the first verb or present progressive copula or auxiliary verb in the sentence based on the English Lexicon Project

verb1_syllable_num.Description: Number of syllables composing the first verb or present progressive copula or auxiliary verb in the sentence based on the English Lexicon Project

verb1_duration.Description: Duration of the first verb or present progressive copula or auxiliary verb in the sentence

verb2.Description: The second verb or the word NOT in the sentence

verb2_word_frequency.Description: HAL frequency of the second verb or the word NOT in the sentence based on the English Lexicon Project

verb2_word_length.Description: Number of characters composing the second verb or the word NOT in the sentence based on the English Lexicon Project

verb2_syllable_num.Description: Number of syllables composing the second verb or the word NOT in the sentence based on the English Lexicon Project

verb2_duration.Description: Duration of the second verb or the word NOT in the sentence

verb3.Description: The third verb in the sentence

verb3_word_frequency.Description: HAL frequency of the third verb in the sentence based on the English Lexicon Project

verb3_word_length.Description: Number of characters composing the third verb in the sentence based on the English Lexicon Project

verb3_syllable_num.Description: Number of syllables composing the third verb in the sentence based on the English Lexicon Project

verb3_duration.Description: Duration of the third verb in the sentence

subject_phrase_duration.Description: The total duration of the subject phrase including the subject and all the verbs

pause2_duration.Description: Duration of pause between the subject phrase and the object phrase

number.Description: The number at the beginning of the object phrase

number_word_frequency.Description: HAL frequency of the number word at the beginning of the object phrase based on the English Lexicon Project

number_word_length.Description: Number of characters composing the number word at the beginning of the object phrase based on the English Lexicon Project

number_syllable_num.Description: Number of syllables composing the number word at the beginning of the object phrase based on the English Lexicon Project

number_duration.Description: Duration of the number word at the beginning of the object phrase

object.Description: The object at the end of the object phrase

object_word_frequency.Description: HAL frequency of the object word at the end of the object phrase based on the English Lexicon Project

object_word_length.Description: Number of characters composing the object word at the end of the object phrase based on the English Lexicon Project

object_syllable_num.Description: Number of syllables composing the object word at the end of the object phrase based on the English Lexicon Project

object_duration.Description: Duration of the object word at the end of the object phrase

object_phrase_duration.Description: The total duration of the object phrase including the number and the object
